47  LogStream::LogStream(unsigned int level)
48  :
49  FileDescriptor(STDERR_FILENO), rlog::StdioNode(STDERR_FILENO) {
50  if (level & Log_Undef) {
51  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel(""));
52  }
53  if (level & Log_Critical) {
54  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("critical"));
55  }
56  if (level & Log_Error) {
57  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("error"));
58  }
59  if (level & Log_Warning) {
60  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("warning"));
61  }
62  if (level & Log_Notice) {
63  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("notice"));
64  }
65  if (level & Log_Info) {
66  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("info"));
67  }

69  subscribeTo((rlog::RLogNode*)rlog::GetGlobalChannel("debug"));
